text: @RepThompson @SpeakerPelosi Hey Mike Thompson....if you are so worried about helping people recover why don't you prepare a bill that focuses entirely on the coronavirus relief.....without all of the democrat political agenda crap?    Why do you need all the bull shit inside ???????   PLEASE RESPOND
